title: "Was that a real person or an intelligent virtual agent you just spoke to?"
excerpt: "As consumers have quickly adapted to getting help from their personal virtual assistants, they now increasingly prefer to have self-service options when contacting a business. Recent research found that nearly a third (30 percent) of consumers that own smart devices use them to shop and order from."
